comments.author: camel33
comments.body: This graphics is amazing, probably better than in Far Cry 6. I hope my RTX 3060 can handle this game. I'm looking forward to the demo version.

comments.body: Quote from: sharex14 on October 21, 2022, 12:30:27 PMWe know . when will the demo be?I m working on it. It is very hard to make a gaming demo in the middle of a project. Every day I have the dev fixing something new and I want to integrate to the demo. I have to finish this month.We are also revamping our marketing right now. and evaluate doing advertising at Bitcointalk. But so far it sounds convoluted, compare with other places.
